Trusted by board certified OBGYN's

        Explore Expert Perspectives on Your  Intimate Wellbeing
      




DR. JESSICA SHEPHERD
MD, MBA, FACOG

            Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.
        



DR. SEEMA SHAH
MD, MPH, FACOG

			Dr. Seema Shah, MD, MPH, FACOG, is licensed in California. She earned her MD at Thomas Jefferson University, MPH at UC Berkeley, and BA at Bryn Mawr College.

Dedicated to women’s access to care, her clinical work spans Everett Clinic, Indian Health Service, private practice, and Kaiser Permanente. She leads initiatives in maternal health, safety, menopause, surgery, and patient access, and advises healthcare organizations.
        









                    Dr. Jessica Shepherd, MD, MBA, FACOG, is affiliated with Baylor University Medical Center in Dallas, Texas. She earned her MBA at the University of Louisville and completed a Minimally Invasive Gynecologic Fellowship.

Passionate about educating women, she appears on Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Talk, Dr. Oz, and
 Doctors Radio. She has written for Forbes, Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Women’s Health Magazine, Women’s Day, Self, Family Circle, Parents, Essence, and WebMD.

Feedback From Our Customers






Wow, I was a skeptic...

















I was a skeptic, but honestly after the first use I started to experience a difference. After the second use I was a believer. After struggling with this discomfort for what it felt like an eternity, this product helped me with my confidence until I see my physician 10/10 recommend :) ~ Julie V.☆ Individual results may vary.






		                    				Bacterial Vaginosis (BV) Symptoms 2 Day Dose
		                    			









Great stuff! Holistic medicine person...

















I’m a holistic medicine person as much as possible. I’m an older female that suffers from vaginitis pretty regularly. So far after using this product to get rid of my last bout with it I started using the fem wash since they claim it regulates bacteria and I’m genuinely happy. The smell is feminine and pleasant because of the natural ingredients.  I will be a loyal customer and I’m glad I took the chance to try this! ~ Cassandra W.☆ Individual results may vary.






		                    				Bacterial Vaginosis & Feminine Wash | FemiClear

Amazing!!!
